name: Heartland Red Silverfish - The Mountains
description:
Here's our teams take on street fighter.

Art - Ebony (Character), Briony (Background), Lewis (player head and log bridge)

Base code and collisions - Lewis, Kieran

AI behaviour, physics and control systems - Lewis

Animation, Rigging and weight painting - Lewis

Music - Lewis

Meh, I did a lot. I'm putting my name to it.

WASD or Arrow keys to move

left and right mouse  or R and F to kick and punch.

Known bugs:

Game will not restart after 2nd time winning or losing.
